npm install @openzeppelin/contracts
solc contracts/Gateway/GatewayContract.sol --via-ir --optimize --abi --bin -o artifacts --overwrite --include-path 'node_modules/' --base-path '/'

solc --abi --bin --storage-layout contracts/Gateway/GatewayContract.sol contracts/Gateway/TestAsyncDecrypt.sol --base-path / --include-path node_modules/ -o artifacts --overwrite

solc --abi --bin --storage-layout contracts/oracle/OraclePredeploy.sol contracts/examples/TestAsyncDecrypt.sol --base-path / --include-path node_modules/ -o artifacts --overwrite

# starting up everything 

docker-compose up --build

in remix:
    - compile and deploy OraclePredeploy, you can use your metamask address for the constructor
    - call addRelayer with you mm address
        - or - 
    - cargo run --bin deploy, take note of the output: "Contract deployed at: <ADDRESS>"
    - get the address of the OraclePredeploy, update PredeployAddress.sol with it and then deploy TestAsyncDecrypt

in rust:
    - update consts.rs 
        - const DEFAULT_RELAYER_ADDRESS: &str = "f39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266";
        - const DEFAULT_ORACLE_PREDEPLOY_ADDRESS: &str = "62BaaF9FaFa03F8406b84bBbdC992f04295190dC";
        - const DEFAULT_TEST_ASYNC_DECRYPT_ADDRESS: &str = "62BaaF9FaFa03F8406b84bBbdC992f04295190dC";
    - cargo run --bin test
    - RUST_LOG=info cargo run --bin gateway



path,address,public key,private key
